text:
Briana DeJesus attends her baby shower on May 21. The reality star shared a first photo of daughter Stella Star on Tuesday. Photo by Briana DeJesus /Instagram

July 5 (UPI) -- Teen Mom 2 star Briana DeJesus is giving fans a first glimpse of her newborn daughter. The 23-year-old reality star shared a photo of Stella Star Tuesday on Instagram after welcoming the infant this week. Advertisement

"My StellyBelly girl," she captioned the picture, adding a heart-eyes emoji.

DeJesus gave birth to Stella on Sunday, and announced her daughter's arrival the same day. She shared the news by posting a photo of a "Welcome Baby" sheet from Osceola Regional Medical Center in Kissimmee, Fla.

"What a blessing," the star wrote at the time.

DeJesus is also mom to 5-year-old daughter Nova with ex-boyfriend Devoin Austin. She announced in January that she was expecting with her then-beau, Luis, and later confirmed she was pregnant with a baby girl.

"Stella, you will be loved and everybody can't wait to meet you!" she wrote on Instagram following her baby shower in May.

My StellyBelly girl 😍 Advertisement A post shared by Bri Baby💋 (@_brianadejesus) on Jul 4, 2017 at 7:15am PDT

DeJesus came to fame on the MTV series 16 & Pregnant before starring on Teen Mom 3. She announced in June that she will star on Teen Mom 2 Season 8 with Jenelle Evans, Chelsea Houska, Kailyn Lowry and Leah Messer.

"[I'm] excited to continue sharing my story because things left off right around when life was becoming hectic and now I get to finish sharing that story," the star told E! News.
title: 'Teen Mom 2' star Briana DeJesus introduces daughter Stella
